sentences: Rikutud mees oli pärast õnnetust haiglas.
context: The Estonian word 'rikutud' is an adjective that means damaged, broken, spoiled or corrupted. It is the plural nominative form of the adjective 'rikunud'. This word can describe physical objects that are no longer in good condition (like broken toys), spoiled food that has gone bad, or abstract concepts like corrupted systems or ruined relationships.
